snippet: The 237,746-pound Georgia Guidestones, inscribed with teachings in eight languages, could lead the way to prosperity for the small town of Elberton.
abstract: Georgia Guidestones, 237,746-pound monument inscribed with teachings in eight languages, could lead way to prosperity for small town of Elberton; residents are hoping to turn mysterious structure, paid for by anonymous man to offer instructions for life after nuclear attack, into moneymaker in economic hard times by attracting tourists.
lead_paragraph: The 237,746-pound Georgia Guidestones, inscribed with teachings in eight languages, could lead the way to prosperity for the small town of Elberton.

headline.main: A Monument’s Mysteries Include Whether It Can Draw Tourists
headline.print_headline: A Monument’s Mysteries Include Whether It Can Draw Tourists
